sentences.english: The boy made many blunders as he stumbled through his recitation.
sentences.chinese: 這個男孩在訥訥的背書中出了很多差錯。

sentences.english: "I have greatly wronged thee," murmured Hester.
sentences.chinese: “我讓你太受委屈了，”海絲特訥訥着說。

sentences.english: Of course it's only because Tom isn't home, ' said Mrs Parsons vaguely.
sentences.chinese: “當然啦，全怪託姆不在家，”帕森斯太太訥訥地說。
